import React from 'react' import { Icon } from "@iconify/react/dist/iconify.js"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Signup = () => { const navigate= useNavigate(); const handleSignup = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); navigate('/Login'); }; return(

Company Signup

Register your company! please enter your details

Or sign up with

Already have an account?{" "} Sign In

) ; } export default Signup
